attributes.action: Designate public transport staff as key workers.
attributes.additional_details:
Public transport staff are the backbone of our country, keeping us connected. In these extraordinary times, public transport staff are keeping the country moving, getting medical and emergency workers to work to keep us safe, getting retail workers to work to feed the nation.

For public transport to not be designated as "key workers" is an insult to the thousands of people working extremely hard to keep the country moving in these extraordinarily tough times.
attributes.background: The government should designate public transport staff as key workers, recognising the amazing work they do in keeping the country moving, especially in tough times like these.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has published guidance for schools on maintaining educational provision, including which sectors it considers key to the COVID-19 response. Transport is included in this guidance: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/coronavirus-covid-19-maintaining-educational-provision/guidance-for-schools-colleges-and-local-authorities-on-maintaining-educational-provision
